categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Battle of Lubang Minor  (Galactic Civil War)

A battle was fought on a Lubang Minor between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War seven months after the Battle of Yavin. The Rebel forces arrived on the planet in order to establish a listening post there, but the Empire followed them there. With the help of clone trooper BL-1707, who had been stranded on the planet since the Clone Wars, the Rebel troops managed to escape.
